text: Marthe Mercadier (23 October 1928 – 15 September 2021) was a French actress. She was known for her roles as Une in Three Telegrams (1950), Simone in The Night Is My Kingdom (1951) and as Annette in Rendezvous in Grenada (1951). Mercadier died on 15 September 2021 in Puteaux, France from problems caused by Alzheimer's disease at the age of 92.Marthe Mercadier, la reine du théâtre de boulevard, est morte ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1928 births Category:2021 deaths Category:French movie actors Category:French television actors Category:French stage actors Category:French voice actors Category:Deaths from Alzheimer's disease
title: Marthe Mercadier
